Name: Crossroad
About the game: Genres: Visual Novel, ADV, Adventure, Mystery, Romance, Otome Length: 5+ hours Every granddaughter visits her grandmother for tea and something delicious to eat. Lumy is no different from millions of other girls. That is, except for one thing… The way to Gran’s cottage lies through the dense, dark, and dangerous woods, where she may discover strangers, mysteries, and curiosities. Delve into a peculiar world, experience things from Lumy’s point of view, and decide her fate as she helps others find their paths yet again. Crossroad is a fun, light, and romantic visual novel that will spirit you away from your real life problems! About the Protagonist Lumy is a pure-hearted girl who has been raised far from the hustle and bustle of busy cities. As naïve as a child, and curious to a fault, but never spoiled, Lumy doesn’t view the world as others do. She is a young herbalist and healer who loves the world around her, and always works to change it for the better. This game features: - 34 endings (romantic ones, unexpected ones, funny ones); - More than 15 music tracks; - Lots of unusual items to find. Learn about the game world through these curious trinkets; - Many CGs; - 5 “romantic interests” (not counting a few secret ones); - Art Gallery, Sound Room Item Room; - Many fun and unique characters;
